content: {"name": "LifeStyles of Maryland", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Charles County Residents ", "email": "", "url": "https://charlescountyfoodconnection.org/event/lifestyles-of-maryland-food-pantry/2023-08-28/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "101 Catalpa Drive, Suite 103, PO Box 1794", "address_2": null, "city": "La Plata", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20646", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.52468, "longitude": -76.97363}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 609-9900", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Helps with income, rent, utility and food stamps"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID must show you reside in this county."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
